ibm.maven.plugins.ace.mojos

Class CreateBarMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • ibm.maven.plugins.ace.mojos.CreateBarMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PackageaceBarMojo

    @Mojo(name="create-bar",
      defaultPhase=COMPILE)
public class CreateBarMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Creates a .bar file from a ace-bar Project. Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String applicationName 
      protected Boolean applyBarOverride
      Whether the applybaroverride command should be executed or not
      protected File barName
      The name of the BAR (compressed file format) archive file where the result is stored.
      protected org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager buildPluginManager
      The Maven PluginManager Object
      protected boolean cleanBuild
      Refreshes the projects in the workspace and then invokes a clean build before new items are added to the BAR file.
      protected File createBarTraceFile
      The name of the trace file to use when creating bar files
      protected boolean deployAsSource
      Include "-deployAsSource" parameter?
      protected String discardJarsPattern
      Pattern (or patterns, comma separated) of jars to be excluded from the generated bar file
      protected boolean esql21
      Compile ESQL for brokers at Version 2.1 of the product.
      protected String excludeArtifactsPattern
      Exclude artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated).
      protected String includeArtifactsPattern
      Include artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated).
      protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
      The Maven Project Object

      Projects containing files to include in the BAR file in the workspace.
      protected org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session
      The Maven Session Object
      protected Boolean skipWSErrorCheck
      Whether classloaders are in use with this bar
      protected File toolkitInstallDir
      Installation directory of the ace Toolkit
      protected String toolkitVersion
      Major Version number of the ace Toolkit.
      protected Boolean useClassloaders
      Whether classloaders are in use with this bar
      protected String versionString
      Appends the _ (underscore) character and the value of VersionString to the names of the compiled versions of the message flows (.cmf) files added to the BAR file, before the file extension.
      protected File workspace
      The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

    • Field Detail

      • barName

        @Parameter(property="ace.barName",
           defaultValue="${project.build.directory}/ace/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.bar",
           required=true)
protected File barName
        The name of the BAR (compressed file format) archive file where the result is stored.

      • applyBarOverride

        @Parameter(property="ace.applybaroverride",
           defaultValue="true",
           required=true)
protected Boolean applyBarOverride
        Whether the applybaroverride command should be executed or not

      • cleanBuild

        @Parameter(property="ace.cleanBuild",
           defaultValue="true",
           required=true)
protected boolean cleanBuild
        Refreshes the projects in the workspace and then invokes a clean build before new items are added to the BAR file.

      • createBarTraceFile

        @Parameter(property="ace.createBarTraceFile",
           defaultValue="${project.build.directory}/createbartrace.txt",
           required=true)
protected File createBarTraceFile
        The name of the trace file to use when creating bar files

      • deployAsSource

        @Parameter(property="ace.deployAsSource",
           defaultValue="true",
           required=true)
protected boolean deployAsSource
        Include "-deployAsSource" parameter?

      • esql21

        @Parameter(property="ace.esql21",
           defaultValue="false",
           required=true)
protected boolean esql21
        Compile ESQL for brokers at Version 2.1 of the product.

      • excludeArtifactsPattern

        @Parameter(property="ace.excludeArtifactsPattern",
           defaultValue="**/pom.xml")
protected String excludeArtifactsPattern
        Exclude artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated). By default, exclude pom.xml's as each project will have one and this causes a packaging error.

      • includeArtifactsPattern

        @Parameter(property="ace.includeArtifactsPattern",
           defaultValue="**/*.xsdzip,**/*.tblxmi,**/*.xsd,**/*.wsdl,**/*.dictionary,**/*.xsl,**/*.xslt,**/*.xml,**/*.jar,**/*.inadapter,**/*.outadapter,**/*.insca,**/*.outsca,**/*.descriptor,**/*.idl,**/*.map,**/*.msgflow",
           required=true)
protected String includeArtifactsPattern
        Include artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated). By default, the default value used for mqsipackagebar, except .esql & .subflow, which as not compilable
        See Also:
        ace9 Documentation

      • projectName

        @Parameter(property="ace.projectName",
           defaultValue="")
protected String projectName
        Projects containing files to include in the BAR file in the workspace. Required for a new workspace. A new workspace is a system folder which don't contain a .metadata folder.

      • applicationName

        @Parameter(property="ace.applicationName",
           defaultValue="")
protected String applicationName

      • skipWSErrorCheck

        @Parameter(property="ace.skipWSErrorCheck",
           defaultValue="false")
protected Boolean skipWSErrorCheck
        Whether classloaders are in use with this bar

      • toolkitInstallDir

        @Parameter(property="ace.toolkitInstallDir",
           required=true)
protected File toolkitInstallDir
        Installation directory of the ace Toolkit

      • toolkitVersion

        @Parameter(property="ace.toolkitVersion",
           defaultValue="10")
protected String toolkitVersion
        Major Version number of the ace Toolkit. (Current not used, but will be needed when support for difference Versions with different options is supported)

      • versionString

        @Parameter(property="ace.versionString",
           defaultValue="${project.version}")
protected String versionString
        Appends the _ (underscore) character and the value of VersionString to the names of the compiled versions of the message flows (.cmf) files added to the BAR file, before the file extension.

      • workspace

        @Parameter(property="ace.workspace",
           defaultValue="${project.build.directory}/ace/workspace",
           required=true)
protected File workspace
        The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

      • discardJarsPattern

        @Parameter(property="ace.discardJarsPattern",
           defaultValue="**/javacompute_**.jar,**/jplugin2_**.jar")
protected String discardJarsPattern
        Pattern (or patterns, comma separated) of jars to be excluded from the generated bar file

      • useClassloaders

        @Parameter(property="ace.useClassloaders",
           defaultValue="false",
           required=true)
protected Boolean useClassloaders
        Whether classloaders are in use with this bar
